    • Method Detail

      • nextCard

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> nextCard(Board enemyBoard,
                                          Board playerBoard)
        This method finds the next card that will be played by the AI.
        Parameters:
        enemyBoard - - Object containing cards played by the AI that are currently on the board.
        playerBoard - - Object containing cards played by the user that are currently on the board.
        Returns:
        Returns next card to be played and cards that are selected to merge or have a special effect happen on.
